docs.text: tKAP ¶ tKAP is a set of Terraform / Terragrunt modules designed to get you everything you need to run a production Kapsule cluster on Scaleway Element. It ships with sensible defaults, and add a lot of common addons with their configurations that work out of the box.
docs.title: Overview

docs.text: tKAP is a set of Terraform / Terragrunt modules designed to get you everything you need to run a production Kapsule cluster on Scaleway Element. It ships with sensible defaults, and add a lot of common addons with their configurations that work out of the box.
